{"id":1207011732,"question_id":3354,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"2 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1710747416,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"204 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1207011732/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Replace Question Marks in String to Minimize Its Value","memory":"49.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public String minimizeStringValue(String s) {\n\n        HashMap<Character, Integer> map = new HashMap<>();\n        List<Integer> pos = new ArrayList<>();\n\n        for(int i=0; i<s.length(); i++){\n            char ch = s.charAt(i);\n            \n            if(ch!='?') \n                map.put(ch, map.getOrDefault(ch,0)+1);\n            else\n                pos.add(i);\n        }\n\n        List<Character> list = new ArrayList<>();\n        for(int i=0; i<pos.size(); i++){\n            int min = Integer.MAX_VALUE;\n            for(char ch='a'; ch<='z'; ch++){\n                min = Math.min(min, map.getOrDefault(ch, 0));\n            }\n\n            for(char ch='a'; ch<='z'; ch++){\n                if(map.getOrDefault(ch,0)==min){\n                    map.put(ch, map.getOrDefault(ch, 0)+1);\n                    list.add(ch);\n                    break;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n\n        Collections.sort(list);\n        int idx = 0;\n        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder(s);\n        for(int p : pos){\n            sb.setCharAt(p, list.get(idx++));\n        }\n\n        return sb.toString();\n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"replace-question-marks-in-string-to-minimize-its-value","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
